name: strong
features: Delivery : FAST & FREE Shipping on All Orders
Premium Leather : Thicker, pro-grade leather for unmatched durability and a soft, responsive feel
2X Durability : Built to last through countless swings—perfect for the cage or the game
Micro-Perforations : Strategic ventilation in the palm for enhanced breathability and moisture control
Seamless Palm : Patch-free design eliminates bunching and maximizes bat control
Powerstrap Closure : Reinforced wrist stability with a secure, pro-preferred strap system
360° Long Cuff : Extra-tall 60mm wrist wrap delivers superior support and reduces fatigue
Pro-Designed : Crafted with feedback from MLB athletes for elite performance and reliability
